LLLLUPHaestus.brief: Kernel-based Root Solution for Enhanced Android Control
LLLLUPHaestus.description: KernelSU provides a kernel-level root solution, enabling advanced control over your Android device. To get started, use a kernel that supports KernelSU (refer to the TWRP tab). Most modules require Zygisk, so install ZygiskNext and Zygisk Hider (see Modules tab). For apps needing SU access, open the KernelSU application and enable root access within the app section.
LLLLUPHaestus.heading: Maximize Control with KernelSU

bootloader_spoofer.brief: Spoof Bootloader Status to Pass Local Attestations
bootloader_spoofer.description: Bootloader Spoofer prevents apps from detecting an unlocked bootloader, helping you pass local attestations effortlessly. It's essential for maintaining the security and functionality of apps that check bootloader status.
bootloader_spoofer.heading: Maintain App Integrity with Bootloader Spoofer

dynamic_spot.brief: Transform Your Notifications with Dynamic Spot
dynamic_spot.description: Dynamic Spot brings iPhone 15 Pro's Dynamic Island notifications to Android. Enjoy iOS notification popups, Live Activities, music controls, and more. Customize interactions, select apps for notifications, and use features like timer countdown, battery alerts, and a music visualizer.
dynamic_spot.heading: Revolutionize Notifications with Dynamic Spot

material_files.brief: Advanced File Manager with Root and NAS Support
material_files.description: Material Files is a robust, open-source file manager following Material Design principles. It supports root access, NAS management, and various archive formats. Enjoy customizable themes, Linux-aware functionalities, and secure file handling on your Android device.
material_files.heading: Discover the Power of Material Files

momo.brief: Check Root Detection Status on Your Device
momo.description: Momo helps you quickly and easily check if apps can detect root on your phone. If apps still detect root, ensure Play certification. To bypass bootloader detection, install Bootloader Spoofer (see Apps tab) and remove the TWRP folder from internal storage.
momo.heading: Ensure Stealth with Momo

termux.brief: Full-fledged Terminal Emulator and Linux Environment for Android
termux.description: Termux is a powerful Android terminal emulator offering a complete Linux environment. Securely access remote servers with SSH, customize with APT package management, and explore a variety of development tools including Python, Node.js, and more. Ideal for both casual and power users.
termux.heading: Harness the Power of Termux

viPER4Android.brief: Advanced Audio Equalizer for Enhanced Sound Experience
viPER4Android.description: ViPER4Android lets you tweak your phone's sound settings to perfection. Install the ViPER4Android module (see Modules tab), open the app, enable Legacy mode, and turn on Master Limiter. Customize the audio settings to suit your preferences for an enhanced listening experience.
viPER4Android.heading: Enhance Your Audio with ViPER4Android

viperFX.description: ViperFX offers a modern UI redesign of ViPER4Android, providing the same powerful audio tweaking capabilities with a refreshed interface. Install the ViPER4Android module (see Modules tab), follow the setup steps, and enjoy a revamped audio experience tailored to your preferences.
viperFX.heading: Experience Enhanced Audio with ViperFX
